concept_definition: having the form of a circle; round
Having the shape of a square; having four equal straight sides and four right angles.
having the shape of a rectangle; having four right angles and opposite sides equal in length
having the shape of a triangle; consisting of or forming three angles or three sides
Shaped like an elongated circle; having a rounded outline resembling an egg.
having the shape of a cube; three-dimensional and bounded by six equal square faces
shaped like a sphere; having the form of a round three-dimensional ball
shaped like a cylinder; having the form of a solid or hollow object with straight parallel sides and circular ends
shaped like a cone; having the form of a three-dimensional figure with a circular base that tapers to a point
having the shape of a pyramid; relating to or resembling a pyramid
having six angles and six sides; shaped like a hexagon
having five angles and five sides; shaped like a pentagon
having eight sides and eight angles; shaped like an octagon
extending in one direction without curving
